00032 RainbruRPG::Editor::Highlighter::Highlighter(QObject *parent)
00033   : QObject(parent)
00034 {
00035 }

00042 void RainbruRPG::Editor::Highlighter::addToDocument(QTextDocument *doc)
00043 {
00044   connect(doc, SIGNAL(contentsChange(int, int, int)),
00045           this, SLOT(highlight(int, int, int)));
00046 }
00047 
00054 void RainbruRPG::Editor::Highlighter::addMapping(const QString &pattern,
00055                              const QTextCharFormat &format)
00056 {
00057   mappings[pattern] = format;
00058 }
00059 
00067 void RainbruRPG::Editor::Highlighter::highlight(int position, int removed, int added)
00068 {
00069   QTextDocument *doc = qobject_cast<QTextDocument *>(sender());
00070   
00071   QTextBlock block = doc->findBlock(position);
00072   if (!block.isValid())
00073     return;
00074 
00075   QTextBlock endBlock;
00076   if (added > removed)
00077     endBlock = doc->findBlock(position + added);
00078   else
00079     endBlock = block;
00080   
00081   while (block.isValid() && !(endBlock < block)) {
00082     highlightBlock(block);
00083     block = block.next();
00084   }
00085 }
00086 
00094 void RainbruRPG::Editor::Highlighter::highlightBlock(QTextBlock block)
00095 {
00096   QTextLayout *layout = block.layout();
00097   const QString text = block.text();
00098   
00099   QList<QTextLayout::FormatRange> overrides;
00100   
00101   foreach (QString pattern, mappings.keys()) {
00102     QRegExp expression(pattern);
00103     int i = text.indexOf(expression);
00104     while (i >= 0) {
00105       QTextLayout::FormatRange range;
00106       range.start = i;
00107       range.length = expression.matchedLength();
00108       range.format = mappings[pattern];
00109       overrides << range;
00110       
00111       i = text.indexOf(expression, i + expression.matchedLength());
00112     }
00113   }
00114   
00115   layout->setAdditionalFormats(overrides);
00116   const_cast<QTextDocument *>(block.document())->markContentsDirty(
00117                                 block.position(), block.length());
00118 }
00119 
00125 void RainbruRPG::Editor::Highlighter::textChanged(QTextDocument *doc){
00126 
00127   QTextBlock block = doc->begin();
00128   QTextBlock endBlock=doc->end();
00129 
00130   while (!(endBlock < block)) {
00131     cout << "treating block" << endl;
00132     if (block.isValid()){
00133       highlightBlock(block);
00134     }
00135 
00136     block = block.next();
00137   }
00138 }
